text: Jan Laverty Jones (born Janis Lyle Laverty, later Blackhurst; March 16, 1949) is an American businesswoman and politician. She was mayor of Las Vegas, Nevada from 1991 to 1999 and the first woman to serve as mayor of Las Vegas. Jones is a member of the Democratic Party.Biography, harrahs.com; accessed January 7, 2017. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American political activists Category:Mayors of Las Vegas Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jan Laverty Jones
